amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part A of House Report 119-255 to amend Section 1555 of the FY24 NDAA regarding contracting for military recruitment to prohibit the Department of Defense from contracting with entities that perform fact-checking and information-grading services for purposes of censoring their political opponents.
amendment.purpose: Amendment modifies section 1555 of the FY24 NDAA regarding contracting for military recruitment to prohibit the Department of Defense from contracting with entities that perform fact-checking and information-grading services for purposes of censoring their political opponents.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 211 (Roll no. 258).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 211 (Roll no. 258).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
